name: Talking Great White HD - for iPad
name_original: Talking Great White HD - for iPad
description:
Talking Great White is your pet shark on your iPad. You can talk to him and he will repeat everything you say with a deep shark voice.

You can feed him, pet him, poke him or even grab his tail to make him angry.
You can also swim around or under him and also you can play fetch with him. You can even get him to break the iPad glass.

*******************************************************************
10/2/2011 – Featured by Apple in the “New & Noteworthy” of the Action, Adventure and Entertainment categories

What people are saying
----------------------------------

So funny and really good … - ★★★★★ - by Sharktastic55
So funny lol
*******************************************************************

★★★ FEATURES★★★
- Talk to him and he will repeat everything you say with a deep shark voice.
- Pet him and he will really like it.
- Feed him with his favorite food, a Juicy Yellowfin Tuna.
- Poke his head or belly and he will try to bite your finger.
- Touch his tail and he will get very angry.
- Play fetch with him.
- Swim around and under him to see him from different angles.
- Release a Puffer fish and see how he reacts.
- Make him attack the camera.
- Make him break the iPad glass.

You can also disable the talk back feature (shark repeating).
